verbose_text: We also observed preneoplastic lesions and tumor tissue that were positive for GSTP1 (XREF_FIG A; 5M N, 9M N, 12M T and 18M T in GSTP1), which simultaneously exhibited decreases in the expression of NOX4 (XREF_FIG A; 5M N, 9M N, 12M T and 18M T in NOX4) of 38%, 27%, 52% and 59%, respectively (XREF_FIG B) compared with that in UT liver tissue (XREF_FIG A; UT in NOX4).
